page.title: 04HOUSING BUTTERFURLONG
page.content: The roof is made of clay tiles.The building is made of brick inside and part of it is plaster outside.The animals they have are 1 cat 4 goats and 3 ducks 9 geese and chickens.The house is about 300 years old.It has 9 rooms and the room that they use as a lounge used to be a cowshed and as a stable .The barn was built in 1823.It is made of wood and was used for storing wood hay or straw and the floor is made of tiles.In 1981 the barn roof was painted.They have one and threequarter acres of land and their house is the biggest and oldest of Butterfurlong houses.
